name: Jamin "The Kid" Murray
text: Great collection and great prices. Definitely a must place to go to for all game collectors and anyone looking for that missing piece to their collection. Employee's were great and knew what they were talking about. Always a great experience with both the customer and employee are passionate about it.

name: Ryan K
text: The crazy thing is I have never stepped foot in the store before. All of my transactions have been online. But let me tell you, they are my go-to store for video games. I have made several purchases and they have always done a great job. Good communication and willingness to go above and beyond. I never hesitate to reach out with a gaming need or refer to any of my friends. This was a no-brainer to give a 5 star review.
